review: Decent place. The service was good for the most part but the waiter was a bit air-headed. The ambiance gives off an earthy feel-good vibe. The food was cooked to perfection. 4 stars of quality.

I can't believe this place is still in business! Everything tasted either microwaved or straight from a can. I found a dead cockroach on the floor of my booth. They can survive a nuclear explosion, but the entree was too much for them. I wish I could put a sign out front that said "ABANDON HOPE ALL YE WHO ENTER HERE!"
Yummers! I was happy to see how clean everything was. Everything was just so yummy. The desserts must be sprinkled with crack because I just craved for more and more. Easily earned their 5 stars!
Decent place. The fish was undercooked. I was not very pleased to find out that the coffee wasn't organic. Overall, this place is just so-so. I could come back.

I have been here several times before. I found the entrees to be very agreeable to my personal flavor-profile. There were a lot of interesting decorations on the walls. I had a satisfactory experience and will have to try it again.

This is one of my favorite places. The waitress did an excellent job. Try out the huge selection of incredible appetizers. Everything I tried was bursting with flavor. After my meal, I was knocked into a food coma. 5 stars!
This place had a lot of heart. The ambiance gives off an earthy feel-good vibe. The entrees are simply to die for. The waitress did an excellent job. 5 stars.

My taste buds are still dancing from our last visit! The food was flavorful, savory, and succulent. The waitress was prompt and polite. I want to hire their decorator to furnish my house. The desserts must be sprinkled with crack because I just craved for more and more. Overall experience: 5 stars.
I stumbled on this undiscovered gem right in our neighboorhood. I was happy to see how clean everything was. I found the ambiance to be very charming. Overall experience: 5 stars.
I was pleasantly surprised. There were a lot of interesting decorations on the walls. The waiter was prompt and polite. I was happy to see how clean everything was. 5 stars of quality.

Best experience ever! The food is simply to die for. I found the ambiance to be very charming. Try out the huge selection of incredible appetizers. I was happy to see how clean everything was. 5 stars!

Lame. There were a lot of interesting decorations on the walls. I heard a rumor that the vegetarian dishes are prepared alongside the meat. I found the entrees to not be very agreeable to my personal flavor-profile. 2 stars.

I have been here several times before. The service was good for the most part but the waiter was a bit air-headed. The appetizers must be sprinkled with crack because I just craved for more and more. I was happy to see how clean everything was. The entrees are simply to die for. Satisfactory experience, will come again.
I don't understand the hype about this place. The ambiance gives off an earthy feel-good vibe. The chicken was a little dry. Overall experience: 4 stars.

Bleh. The waiter was barely there. There were bits of food stuck to my silverware. I gave this place two stars because I was feeling extra generous.

Oh my God! So awesome! I want to hire their decorator to furnish my apartment. I was happy to see how clean everything was. The waiter was prompt and polite. Everything I tried was bursting with flavor. They got a new customer for life!
I was pleasantly surprised. The entree I had was sublime. There were a lot of interesting decorations on the walls. I would have rated this higher, but the floors were a little sticky.

I can summarize my visit in one word: Horrible. The center of my steak was so frozen it started singing "Let It Go." The kitchen screwed up my order completely, mixing it up with someone else's. It took almost an hour to get it corrected! Wild horses couldn't drag me back here.

It was much better than I expected. This was one of the best mouth-watering burgers I've had grace my taste buds in a long time. There were a lot of interesting decorations on the walls. Everything I tried was bursting with flavor. 5 stars.

No, no, no, a million times no! The kitchen screwed up my order completely, mixing it up with someone else's. It took almost an hour to get it corrected! There were bits of food stuck to my silverware. My shoes were stained with rat droppings after leaving this place. I wish I could put a sign out front that said "RUN AWAY!"

I was pleasantly surprised. Make sure to save room for dessert, because that was the best part of the meal! Everything was mostly decadent. Everything I tried was bursting with flavor. I could see myself being a regular here.

I really wanted to like this place. The dead flies on the window sill indicated to me that they don't do a good job cleaning and the flies found the food to be toxic. The whole place was just dirty. I found an eyelash that definitely wasn't mine in my food. Overhyped. This food will start the zombie apocalypse. Stay away!
Yumm-o! Try out the huge selection of incredible appetizers. I was happy to see how clean everything was. Everything was just so yummy. Overall experience: 5 stars.

I have been here several times before. This was one of the best mouth-watering burgers I've had grace my taste buds in a long time. The appetizers must be sprinkled with crack because I just craved for more and more. Satisfactory experience, will come again.
I don't understand the hype about this place. The waitress was nothing remarkable. The menu didn't match the one on their website. I gave this place two stars because I was feeling extra generous.

I stumbled on this undiscovered gem right in our neighboorhood. After my meal, I was knocked into a food coma. Everything was mostly decadent. Everything was just so yummy. The waiter did an excellent job. Solid 5 stars.

Best experience ever! Everything was simply decadent. The appetizers must be sprinkled with crack because I just craved for more and more. The decor was unique and incredible. I would eat here every day if I could afford it!

I have been here several times before. The waitress was barely there. The chicken was undercooked. The menu didn't match the one on their website. Some of my favorite dishes are no longer available. Overall experience: 4 stars.

I have been here several times before. I found the ambiance to be very charming. The service was good for the most part but the waiter was a bit tired. I found the entrees to be very agreeable to my personal flavor-profile. Overall experience: 5 stars.

I can summarize my visit in one word: Horrendous. I think this place was featured on Kitchen Nightmares, or at least it should have been. The service was terrible. The waitress was very tired. Too many things on the menu look like crap, smell like crap, and taste like crap. This place is very dumpy and in a serious need of a fresh paint job. I wish I could put a sign out front that said "DON'T EAT HERE!"
This place had a lot of heart. The entree I had was sublime. I felt the prices were too high given the quality of the food. I had a satisfactory experience and will have to try it again.

I have been here several times before. Everything I tried was bursting with flavor. The ambiance gives off an earthy feel-good vibe. The entree I had was sublime. Everything was just so yummy. I docked them one star because the wait to get in was so long.
Yummers! I found the ambiance to be very charming. Everything was just so yummy. The food was flavorful, savory, and succulent. I would eat here every day if I could afford it!

This place is a waste of calories. The photos of the food were appetizing and palpable, but didn't live up to the hype. The service wasn't that good and the waiter was rude. They need to get their act together before I set foot in this place again.

Decent place. There were a lot of interesting decorations on the walls. Make sure to save room for dessert, because that was the best part of the meal! I found the entrees to be very agreeable to my personal flavor-profile. Overall experience: 5 stars.

I can summarize my visit in one word: Horrendous. I heard a rumor that the vegetarian dishes are prepared alongside the meat. Even Chef Boyardee would be disgusted by this sorry attempt at a meal. I found an eyelash that definitely wasn't mine in my food. The whole place was just dirty. I gave 1 star because I couldn't give 0.

This is one of my favorite places. The food was flavorful, savory, and succulent. I found the ambiance to be very charming. Everything I tried was bursting with flavor. The appetizers must be sprinkled with crack because I just craved for more and more. Easily earned their 5 stars!

My taste buds are still singing from our last visit! Everything was simply decadent. Everything was just so yummy. Overall experience: 5 stars.

I'm torn about this place. There were a lot of interesting decorations on the walls. The tofu dish tasted spongy and a bit bland. The service was good for the most part but the waiter was a bit tired. This place deserves its very average rating.
